segments.text: Good morning , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I want to remit 1,000 yuan to my sister in Shanghai .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ... Do I need to put on my sister's name for the receiver ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . You must put on her name and address .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I see . Here you are . Is that OK now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me check . Yes . Your 1,000 remittance , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . What is the rate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This rate is one percent . That will be 10 yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . When will this remittance arrive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Generally it will arrive within three days .
segments.speaker: S1
